patterns: secrecy building ka kya kaam hai?
exam se related secrecy block ka role?
responses: Secrecy Block exam-related confidential work ke liye hota hai like question paper banana, answer sheets security, and result processingà¥¤ Ye block examination block ke pass hai, jahan question papers and answer sheets manage kiya jata hai
DSW (Dean Student Welfare) Block student-related cultural, sports, aur welfare activities ko handle karta hai.Yeh block students ke NSS, events, helpdesk aur samasyaon ka samadhan karta hai.

responses: Auditorium Academic Block First Floor par situated hai. Yeh seminar, conference aur cultural programs ke liye use hota hai. Academic Block ke first floor par auditorium located hai.
